statements: DELETE FROM sampling_techniques_for_ml WHERE feature_1 > 0.5 AND feature_3 < 0.2
DELETE FROM sampling_techniques_for_ml WHERE id = 1 AND feature_1 > 0.5
DELETE FROM sampling_techniques_for_ml WHERE id = 2 AND feature_2 <= 0.4
DELETE FROM SamplingTechniques WHERE technique_name = 'Stratified Sampling';
DELETE FROM data_sampling_techniques WHERE label='Class A';
DELETE FROM sampling_metrics WHERE metric_name='Precision' AND result > 0.9;
DELETE FROM random_sampling WHERE label = TRUE;
